Rule.Name: PublicMethodParametersMustBeCheckedByGuardClassMethod
Rule.Description: All parameters of public members must be checked with a method of a guard class (that class must have the GuardClassAttribute)
Rule.Resolution: The parameter {0} must be checked for a valid value.

Rule.Name: ToStringMustNotBeCalledForStringObjects
Rule.Description: Calling the ToString-Method for a string does make no sense. It only generates memory stress by allocating a new buffer for the string.
